textAfterTable: Command Default An address family is not specified. The default subaddress family (SAFI) is unicast. Command Modes Router configuration Interface configuration Command History Release Modification Release 3.7.2 This command was introduced. Release 3.9.0 Support for IPv6 was added. Usage Guidelines Use the address family command to place the router or interface in address family configuration mode. In router address family configuration mode, you can configure routing that uses standard IPv4 or IPv6 address prefixes. An address family must be specified in interface configuration mode. In interface address family configuration mode, you can alter interface parameters for IPv4or IPv6. You must specify an address family in order to configure parameters that pertain to a single address family. Task ID
